items.question: Can I use my photos anywhere?
items.answer: Yes! You have full rights to use the photos you generate for personal and commercial purposes, as long as they comply with our usage policy.

items.question: What images should I upload for the best results?
items.answer: We recommend uploading clear, well-lit images where your face is fully visible. Avoid heavy filters or dark lighting for optimal AI results.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. All uploads and generated images are stored securely and deleted automatically after processing unless you choose to save them.

items.question: Can I request a refund for my purchase?
items.answer: Refunds can be requested within 7 days if there is a technical issue preventing delivery of your AI images. Please contact our support team.

items.question: Which image file types can I upload?
items.answer: We currently support JPG, JPEG, and PNG formats up to 10MB per image.

items.question: Is it possible to request manual edits for my headshot photos?
items.answer: Yes, premium users can request one round of manual edits per order directly from their dashboard.

items.question: Can I request a redo for my headshot order?
items.answer: Yes. If you are unsatisfied, you can request a redo once within 48 hours of delivery.
